display_long_description:
You’re not just a cleaner. You’re an undercover agent, infiltrating the world of **crime and insanity** by posing as a cleaner, secretly collecting evidence against a mysterious hitman. The hitman runs a large organization called the Syndicate.

[media]

The deeper you dig, the closer you get to uncovering how he operates—and how he does his assassinations.

[media]

The game has a scary layer. As you explore a crime scene, unsettling things could happen—shadows, whispers & apparitions.

[media]

**Your mission**: Infiltrate the Syndicate, and capture the Hitman. The Syndicate doesn’t tolerate failure. And they definitely don’t tolerate rats.

[media]

Each dead body has a background story of their own and you can explore more around to gather evidence and know more about the dead. The more you explore, the more rewarding it is. 

[media]

**Talk to the Devs and join our community on Discord**:  https://discord.gg/cK4aG9sp8f
display_long_description_unprocessed:
You’re not just a cleaner. You’re an undercover agent, infiltrating the world of **crime and insanity** by posing as a cleaner, secretly collecting evidence against a mysterious hitman. The hitman runs a large organization called the Syndicate.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499618274_651211461159970_363128261145746290_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=2NFZCPHAlWwQ7kNvwH6uBbE&_nc_oc=AdkpgidWw53Dn719hccbvuckEcvqWXkfAZNPpyqShFrvJ2UeKZyg7_Y2N2DCDwkLdKM&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=H5oES9qsr70ddIP1xWN0MQ&oh=00_Afpe1VJTlsfh9_PpBr-4S12kXcgeZH5kynDIRA5qb65kPA&oe=697EA0D6)

The deeper you dig, the closer you get to uncovering how he operates—and how he does his assassinations.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491828038_841072975026277_681659773377307198_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=a7XssadDXfQQ7kNvwHw2k90&_nc_oc=AdngXteffsh3iCYIyTFZbP8ScrV8np6wqhWO5wlyVy7nUHAPGolGzpcI5SjiWJIxTk0&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=H5oES9qsr70ddIP1xWN0MQ&oh=00_AfrZ1EeqC0MRFMplzzgaS9h4qREI3VXs0g4_ERInb-UreQ&oe=697EA185)

The game has a scary layer. As you explore a crime scene, unsettling things could happen—shadows, whispers & apparitions.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491825050_1360261182487425_1701726842792685932_n.mp4?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=hlgtLkjs_OAQ7kNvwFJmeyV&_nc_oc=AdnIRVtjosaC8Aw9rDLVAV-MdIrT0ea_TynWPUbnLEkPE90gI3z5G9Bm5MiFb6qu6E0&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=H5oES9qsr70ddIP1xWN0MQ&oh=00_AfpLPFc-fBNrJ3PXkAWtFIxLcDd57JWAm4taoz-qLz-3iQ&oe=697E7371)

**Your mission**: Infiltrate the Syndicate, and capture the Hitman. The Syndicate doesn’t tolerate failure. And they definitely don’t tolerate rats.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499303585_2027694071311803_6829180901132345132_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=wd0X3LIPM0AQ7kNvwECn546&_nc_oc=AdlcVufcZa7GLuPwEa4zOd38UG0iv33rKKmTGMPqTge271tOwaBq4nlaLidE1Gwc53g&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=H5oES9qsr70ddIP1xWN0MQ&oh=00_Afqvf2U_0sFDEcHvapE15O7jYNTkdc5XJS11hiCiej0rNQ&oe=697E96E3)

Each dead body has a background story of their own and you can explore more around to gather evidence and know more about the dead. The more you explore, the more rewarding it is.
